# Knack for Magic (Feat)
## Overview
Magic is not that mysterious to you, and its gifts have made your life a little easier.

**Region:** [[Noble District (Sasserine)|Noble District]] of [[Sasserine]].

**Benefit:** You get a +2 bonus on Spellcraft􀈎 skill checks. In addition, you have an innate talent for magic, granting you the following spell-like abilities as a 1st-level caster: 1/day—*[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]**,* *[[Light (Spell)|light]]**,* and *[[Prestidigitation (Spell)|prestidigitation]]**.*

**Source:** Savage Tide Player's Guide (Paizo), pg. 10
